Well, after a lot of digging, I found out that NTR can be mean a lot of ways. First netori : when a guy gets cucked by other guy but it's from the cuckers perspective (vice versa). Netorare : similar to netori but it's the cucked perspective, or netral. But there are criterias that couldn't be decided for a lot of peoples. Is it ntr if it's just your crush? Or it's only for couples? There are also a definition that implies : a guy(or girl) WATCHED his/her partner cheats, or at least know that they are cheating. Because NTR usually implies that the cucked one gets excited when their partner cheated them.

This isn't NTR. Early on in the doujin it is established that Souta (MC) and Haruka (the girl banging his best friend) ARE NOT LOVERS. In fact, this is straight up one-sided love as only Souta was in love with Haruka but he never took the initiative. NTR is mainly characterized by cheating or unfaithfulness - but you can't cheat on someone who isn't in a romantic relationship with you.

Getting called over to bear witness to your longtime crush in the heat of passion with someone else, only to jumped immediately by said crush’s little sister (the one who called you over in the first place), who then wastes no time rubbing figurative salt into the emotional wound and taking advantage of the resulting shell-shock to jump your bones. Wow. Of all the ways to lose one’s virginity that aren’t out-and-out rape, that is probably the worst, especially since he’s now forever going to associate his first time with those same feelings of despair, inadequacy, and heartbreak. That’s gonna end up in some heavy memory repression and behavioral problems that’ll probably require years of therapy down the line to get over.

Seriously though, the little sister didn’t even make the slightest attempt to comfort him after orchestrating all that on him. What a self-serving sociopath.
